clips.title: Mimir
clips.tagline: Transcribe and annotate audio from the web. Built by journalists, for journalists.

clips.title: Wordbuddy
clips.tagline: Lightweight Python package for automating core tasks in a newspaper's production cycle.

clips.title: Behind the Badge
clips.tagline: A website making thousands of internal disciplinary files released by the New York state police accessible to the public.

clips.title: Table Delim
clips.tagline: Proposed expansion to natural_pdf to identify tables by page elements or regular expressions.

clips.title: Photo Locator
clips.tagline: Python utility to generate GeoJSON from photos stored in Apple's HEIC format. Useful for quickly mapping locations during on-the-beat reporting.

clips.title: Inmate Complaints Dashboard
clips.tagline: Data interface and accompanying API developed for the Data Liberation Project.
